text: Anthony Welsh (born 5 July 1983) is an English actor. Welsh is a graduate of the London Academy of Music and Dramatic Art He had his first film role in the 2012 film Red Tails which was followed by several major roles in film and television including Lucky Gordon in The Trial of Christine Keeler. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Film roles |- !
